title: Mail-Order Marriages: Brides for Brothers / Marriage Risk
description: The mostly male population of Hard Luck, Alaska, is about to swell--because the O'Halloran brothers, who run a bush-plane charter service called Midnight Sons, have launched a campaign to bring women to their hometown.Brides for Brothers: Sawyer O'Halloran is not entirely in favor of his brothers' scheme. He considers himself immune to the charms of any woman--until Abbey Sutherland shows up in Hard Luck, anxious to start over, and with two adorable kids in two!The Marriage Risk: Charles O'Halloran falls hard for Lanni Caldwell. Though he's not the marrying kind, she might just convince him to risk taking the leap. Then he discovers she's the granddaughter of the woman who destroyed his parents' marriage.
author: Debbie Macomber
